com.topcoder.clients.dao.ejb3
Class SearchByFilterUtilityImpl<T extends com.topcoder.clients.model.AuditableEntity,Id extends java.io.Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.clients.dao.ejb3.SearchByFilterUtilityImpl<T,Id>
Type Parameters:
T - The entity type to operate
Id - The type of id of entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchByFilterUtility<T,Id>
public class SearchByFilterUtilityImpl<T extends com.topcoder.clients.model.AuditableEntity,Id extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchByFilterUtility<T,Id>

This class is a realization of the SearchByFilterUtility interface. This class implements the method available for the SearchByFilterUtility interface: search entities using the given filter. Search Builder TopCoder component is used to perform the search operation.

THREAD SAFETY: This class is stateless, it's field is immutable. Search Builder used is used only local and not shared between multiple threads so this component is thread safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mafy, TCSDEVELOPER

Constructor Detail

SearchByFilterUtilityImpl

public SearchByFilterUtilityImpl(java.lang.String searchBundleManagerNamespace,
                                 java.lang.String searchBundleName)

Constructs a new 'SearchByFilterUtilityImpl' instance. Initialize the SearchBundle field.

Parameters:
searchBundleManagerNamespace - the search bundle manager namespace to be used to initialize the SearchBundleManager. Should be not empty and not null.
searchBundleName - the search bundle name to be used to retrieve the SearchBundle. Should be not empty and not null.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if searchBundleManagerNamespace or searchBundleName is null or empty string.
DAOConfigurationException - if this utility can not be configured. (if SearcBundle could not be initialized).
Method Detail

search

public java.util.List<T> search(com.topcoder.search.builder.filter.Filter filter)
                                                                            throws DAOException
Performs the retrieval of all entities that match the given filter in the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.

Specified by:
search in interface SearchByFilterUtility<T extends com.topcoder.clients.model.AuditableEntity,Id extends java.io.Serializable>
Parameters:
filter - the filter that should be used to search the matched entities. Should not be null.
Returns:
the list with entities that match the given filter retrieved from the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if filter is null.
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.
